title: AFK priority queue
body: _**Dear Riot... I have received an AFK low priority queue warning, thus meaning I have to wait 20 minutes before starting a match for 5 games. Here's the problem... I haven't AFK'D any games for a while (month or two) and they were from internet crashes... so please explain.. why I now I have an AFK low priority queue warning when I have not simply AFK'D?**_

replies.body:
Nice formatting.

I'm not 100% how Leaverbuster dishes out punishments, but I'm thinking it's not related to real-time spent out of the game. That is, if you leave a game, you get a marker, and then you don't play for a month (thus not leaving a game for a month). But the moment you play another game you leave that as well, and get another marker, and trigger the penalty because you've got a high-concentration of 'recent' leaver marks on your account. Ultimately, for it to be considered a 'long while' since you've left a game, you'll have to had played a lot of games where you didn't leave.

I could be wrong, but I believe that's how it works.
